name: Dynaminer
description:
Some thieves are trying to steal your treasure by exploiting the mine! Will you survive and keep your treasure safe?

*Instructions:

-Kill your enemies by exploiting dynamite

-Collect your enemies coins

-Dont let your enemies reach the dynamite activator

*Features:

-Easy controls

-Simple to play

-Vibration

-Eartquakes

-Highscores

-Achievements

-Medals

HAVE FUN!
